optimizer.mint package¶

Submodules¶

optimizer.mint.mint module¶

Main Ocelot optimization file Contains the setup for using the scipy.optimize package run simplex and other algorothms Modifiedi for use at LCLS from Ilya’s version

optimizer.mint.obj_function module¶

class optimizer.mint.obj_function.XFELTarget(mi=None, dp=None, eid='x57**2 + y57**2 + x59**2 + y59')[source]¶

Bases: ocelot.optimizer.mint.opt_objects.Target

Objective function

Parameters:
  • mi – Machine interface
  • dp – Device property
  • pen_max – 100, maximum penalty
  • niter – 0, calls number get_penalty()
  • penalties – [], appending penalty
  • times – [], appending the time evolution of get_penalty()
get_alarm()[source]¶

Method to get alarm level (e.g. BLM value).

alarm level must be normalized: 0 is min, 1 is max

Returns:alarm level
get_energy()[source]¶
get_penalty()[source]¶

Method to calculate the penalty on the basis of the value and alarm level.

penalty = -get_value() + alarm()

Returns:penalty
get_spectrum()[source]¶
get_stat_params()[source]¶
get_value()[source]¶

Method to get signal of target function (e.g. SASE signal).

Returns:value

class optimizer.mint.opt_objects.SLACTarget(mi=None, dp=None, eid=None)[source]¶

Bases: optimizer.mint.opt_objects.Target

get_alarm()[source]¶
get_energy()[source]¶
get_penalty()[source]¶
get_stat_params()[source]¶
get_value(seconds=None)[source]¶

Returns data for the ojective function (sase) from the selected detector PV.

At lcls the repetition is 120Hz and the readout buf size is 2800. The last 120 entries correspond to pulse energies over past 1 second.

Args:
seconds (float): Variable input on how many seconds to average data
Returns:
Float of SASE or other detecor measurment
